terms.points_of_notice: This school offers language programs and includes specific terms related to fees, postponements, and other logistics.

terms.refunds_policy: Application fees, admin fees, courier fees are non-refundable.
terms.policy_for_visa_rejections: Refusal document and receipt of visa rejection are required.
terms.insurance_policy: Participants should notify third-party insurers directly if applicable. Cancellation insurance is available.

terms.cancellation: Participants must give at least 14 days' notice for cancellation of arrangements before the start of the course.
terms.liability: Participants are responsible for obtaining medical and travel insurance.
terms.arrival: Check-in is from Sunday before the course start.
terms.duration_policy: All lessons last 45 minutes unless otherwise stated.

terms.cancellation: Tuition protection scheme and refunds based on circumstances

terms.termination: Students wishing to terminate must give advanced notice to receive a refund, and refunds depend on unused packages with specific conditions applied. Refunds will not be granted for missed sections of a package.
terms.passports_and_visas: Participants are responsible for their own visa applications and compliance with local entry regulations. The school provides assistance letters when needed.
terms.refund_policy: Refunds for missed lessons or accommodations based on reasons related to the student will not be entertained, and all refund calculations are based on full prices of the booked services.
terms.accommodation_policies: All accommodations are calculated weekly and align with arrival and departure dates. Adjustments in bookings are subject to specific charges.
terms.lesson_details: All courses are structured with specific start and end dates, and lessons follow typical schedules that cannot be customized.
terms.substitution_policy: The school reserves the right to adjust the placement of participants into levels or substitute courses as deemed appropriate.

locations.address: 29/30 Fitzroy Square, W1T 6DQ, London, United Kingdom

terms.cancellation: 14 days notice required for a refund, as well as proportionate partial refunds for services affected by a Force Majeure Event.
